title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 652.2 - Schedule of tolls effective January 1, 1967
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 652.2 - Schedule of tolls effective January 1, 1967

State Regulations
(a) One-way charge. Vehicle
description

Charge

Passenger cars and all 2 axle vehicles
$.20
3 axle vehicles.30
4 axle vehicles.40
5 axle vehicles.50
1 axle trailers.10
(b) Commuter books. Commuter books will cost $4. These will cover
100 passenger car or stationwagon crossings, will be non-transferable, and will
become void at 12:01 a.m. on the first day of the month six months from the day
of purchase. (c) Commutation
books. Commutation books-$10. These books will cover 100 axle
crossings of any type of vehicle and will have no expiration date. The books
will contain 100 tickets. The toll collector will remove one ticket for each
vehicular axle crossing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
652.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
